GRID.name: Personal Forwarded
GRID.where: (fduserid = getuserid()) AND (fdSolved = false) AND (dependent = false) AND (IsDrop = false) AND (IsSolved = false)

GRID.name: Group Forwarded
GRID.where: (fdgroupid = getgroupid()) AND (fdSolved = false) AND (dependent = false) AND (IsDrop = false) AND (IsSolved = false)

GRID.name: Personal Field Support
GRID.where: (IsDone = true) AND (userid = getuserid()) AND (IsForAction = true) AND (ActionDone = false)

GRID.name: Transport Completion
GRID.where: (IsApproved = true) AND (IsDrop = false) AND (IsDone = false) AND (UserID = getuserid())
